#summary Skylight1 OpenGL library

= Introduction =

Skylight1 OpenGL is a wrapper that provides a Domain Specific Language (DSL) to simplify coding the the Java binding for OpenGL ES - JSR 239.  The library is designed to work in any Java-language-based environment, including MIDP 2.0+ and Android 1.5+.

= Details =

The source code can be found at http://code.google.com/p/skylight1/source/browse/#svn/branch/OpenGLv2/SkylightOpenGL
